text: Chen Xinhua (born 30 January 1960) is a male former international table tennis player. He competed for Great Britain at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==Table tennis career== He is from China, but obtained the English citizenship in 1990. From 1978 to 1992 he won several medals in singles, doubles, and team events in the World Table Tennis Championships. He is also the winner of Table Tennis World Cup in 1985.http://www.ittf.com/ittf_stats/All_events3.asp?ID=1188&NAMES;=CHEN+Xinhua++%28ENG%29&Assoc1;=ENG&Assoc;=&s;_Gender=&s;_Names=xinhua& He also won an English Open title. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Chinese male table tennis players Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:English male table tennis players Category:Chinese emigrants to England Category:Asian Games medalists in table tennis Category:Table tennis players at the 1978 Asian Games Category:Table tennis players at the 1982 Asian Games Category:Table tennis players at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1978 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1982 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Asian Games silver medalists for China Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for China Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:Table tennis players from Fujian Category:People from Fu'an Category:Naturalised table tennis players Category:Table tennis players at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic table tennis players of Great Britain
title: Chen Xinhua
